text:
@realDonaldTrump Hmm let’s see 
Coronavirus was a hoax that will just go away 
Inject or injest Lysol 
Used tear gas to clear out a church for a photo op 
Turned the White House lights off and HID in a bunker 
Did I miss anything or should I go back further than the last six months
